item.title: N++ ‘TEN++’ update announced
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • Switch
  • Xbox One

Available now for PC, coming soon for consoles.

Metanet Software has announced the “TEN++” update for side-scrolling platformer N++ in celebration of the game’s tenth anniversary. It is available now for PC via Steam, and is coming soon to PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Switch.

The update features the game’s “most challenging levels yet” across solo, cooperative, and race modes, as well as six new color palettes.

The developer also teased that its next game is currently in development, and launched a teaser page for users to sign-up for a chance to play the beta when it becomes available.

Watch the “TEN++” update trailer below.

“TEN++” Update Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/10/n-plus-plus-ten-plus-plus-update-announced

item.title: Once Upon a Jester coming to PS5, Xbox Series on October 24
item.content:encoded:
• PS5
  • Xbox Series

Currently available for Switch and PC.

Publisher Crunching Koalas and developer Bonte Avond will release adventure game Once Upon a Jester for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series on October 24, the companies announced.

Once Upon a Jester first launched for Switch and PC via Steam and GOG on November 9, 2022.

Here is an overview of the game, via its store pages:

About

Best friends Sok and Jester devise a mischievous scheme to steal the Royal Diamond!

To complete their master plan, they must start an improv theatre show and outperform every other act—including their rivals, Hofnar and Bok. Only becoming the best show in the kingdom will get them invited to the Royal Theatrical Spectacle in the Royal Palace, where the king keeps his precious gem.

They embark on a grand adventure across a fantasy kingdom, meeting tons of wacky characters, performing improvised shows and singing their hearts out. Along the way, they unintentionally discover the freedom and joy of musical theatre. Will the pair change their wicked ways or do whatever it takes to get rich?

Key Features

  • Embrace Your Creative Freedom – No two shows are alike! The choices are yours as you decide how to wow your audience!
  • Befriend Wacky Characters – Meet and befriend tons of quirky characters—all fully voiced! A friendly Wendingo, a tree looking for its roots and a blob of pesto to name a few.
  • Dive into a Vibrant Fantasy Kingdom – It’s always adventure time in hand-crafted locations like the cozy Dorp Town, the dark mysterious Woudwoods, and the radio-obsessed Stad City.
  • Vibe to the Indie Tunes – An original soundtrack, written and performed by the developers is here to burrow in your ear and never leave!

Watch a new trailer below.

PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series Announce Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/10/once-upon-a-jester-coming-to-ps5-xbox-series-on-october-24
